attributes.action: Hold a vote of no confidence
attributes.additional_details: The prime minister has attended parties explicitly banned under the covid legislation, lied to parliament, been fined by the police for breaking the law but refuses to resign. He brings shame on the country.
attributes.background: MPs should do the right thing and pass a vote of no confidence in the government

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
